ICEBERG: A huge mass of ocean-floating ice which has broken off a glacier or ice shelf
KALE: An edible plant, similar to cabbage, with curled leaves that do not form a dense head (Brassica oleracea var. acephala)
RADICCHIO: A cultivar of chicory (Cichorium intybus var. foliosum) with red leaves and a slightly bitter taste, eaten as a salad vegetable
ROMAINE: Lactuca sativa var. longifolia, a type of lettuce having long crisp leaves forming a slender head.
WATERCRESS: A perennial European herb, Nasturtium officinale, that grows in freshwater streams; used in salads and as a garnish.
